replyContent: The export option only exports a list of selected packages so it appears in the bottom menu after you have selected one or more applications from the main list. You probably want backup from history or favorites instead which is located in the upper right menu. Long press the notification to hide it.

replyContent: This is the fairest solution I can come up with given the current situation. The installer will not be removed from the Play Store so the $2.49 is a one time payment and if the license is revoked a new version will be distributed via a $0.99 in-app purchase.
